original_text: “Son of man, set your face toward the south; preach against the south and prophesy against the forest of the southland.
korean_text: 인자야 너는 얼굴을 남으로 향하라 남으로 향하여 소리내어 남쪽의 숲을 쳐서 예언하라

sentences.original_text: Son of man, set your face toward the south;
sentences.korean_translation: 인자야, 네 얼굴을 남쪽을 향하게 하고

sentences.original_text: and prophesy against the forest of the southland.
